item.title: Amazon is selling a 'tough, smart, and surprisingly handy' smartwatch for just $48
item.description: Save 20% on a watch that'll brave the elements with you.

item.title: Amazon is selling a modular sectional sofa for $400 with 'endless configurations'
item.description: It's a "perfect blend of style, comfort, and versatility."

item.title: Ford takes Tesla EV battle to the NFL
item.description: Ford used its NFL connections to steal a potential marketing opportunity from Tesla.

item.title: Here is why cargo pilots are furious with the FedEx CEO
item.description: FedEx employs over 5,800 pilots and.is the world's largest cargo airline.

item.title: Walmart is selling a $60 portable charger for $28, and customers are 'very happy with the speed of charging'
item.description: At 53% off, shoppers say it's a "bang for your buck."
